title: Teacher Career-Stage-Specific Instructional Material Quality Assessment Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational operations experience and digital literacy proficiency
context.additional_context: Microlearning design optimized for mobile environments, targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Participants can explain at least three distinct quality evaluation criteria for instructional materials, categorized by teacher career stages (early, mid, late).
Participants can propose improvements for educational materials based on statistical analysis of survey data.
Participants can design a practical instructional material evaluation framework for mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
